definition: to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: This paper tries to explore the application of fine powder technology to Chinese medicinal herbs and insoluble medicines.
sentences.chinese: 本文就难溶药物与中草药微细化技术作出探索性研究。

sentences.english: Studying primarily conditions for super-fine comminution of rice bran.
sentences.chinese: 初步考察了影响米糠超微细化工艺的因素。

sentences.english: Starting from the map, the business processes of interest are then further detailed.
sentences.chinese: 从此图开始，将对所关心的业务流程进一步细化。

sentences.english: SAFC is considered a top 10 fine chemical company.
sentences.chinese: SAFC被认为是前10个精细化工公司。

sentences.english: Fingerprint identification procedures, including binarization, thinning, such as extraction of feature points.
sentences.chinese: 指纹识别的程序，包括二值化，细化，提取特征点等。

sentences.english: Pose to pose involves defining the extremes and then filling in the spaces inbetween.
sentences.chinese: 姿势对应法是指先做出关键帧然后逐渐细化的方式。

sentences.english: The magnetic properties and the domain refining effect of laser grooving are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究取向硅钢板磁性及激光刻痕细化磁畴的效果。

sentences.english: Drawing the spot arranges the thin turning the diagram, and personnel's line enters the circuit diagram.
sentences.chinese: 绘制现场布置细化图，及人员行进线路图。

sentences.english: Develop the dynamic model while refining the static model.
sentences.chinese: 在细化静态模型时开发动态模型。

sentences.english: The size reduction process of fly ash with grinding aids has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了助磨剂作用下粉煤灰的微细化过程。

sentences.english: Experiments show that adding the RE element refines the grain of aluminum alloy.
sentences.chinese: 实验表明，加入稀土细化了铝合金晶粒组织。

sentences.english: The mechanism of laser hardening is martensitic hardening and grain refining.
sentences.chinese: 激光相变硬化机理主要是马氏体强化和晶粒细化。

sentences.english: The Industrial Revolution was characterized by specialization of individuals in their work tasks.
sentences.chinese: 工业革命的特点是个体劳动者劳动内容的细化。

sentences.english: A new method for fining grain size has been developed in this peper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种细化柘榴石磁光膜晶粒的有效方法。

sentences.english: Way. In this step , I went over every single highlight and defined it further.
sentences.chinese: 在这一步，我将每一条高光都单独处理并细化。

sentences.english: Methylphenidate extended-release tablets exert different effects on different detailed function.
sentences.chinese: 其对各种细化功能改善的效果有所不同。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
to correspond/answering (one another)/to agree (among the part)/corresponding/relevant/appropriate/(modify) accordingly
step by step/one step at a time
